This is a (very) early DEMO build of the first battle in Thermidor

"Thermidor" is an original multi platform (mobile, Win, Mac, Linux) Turn based 3D Tactical Japanese RPG (currently under development).

"Thermidor" takes place in the unique and fascinating world of 18th century Paris, at the dawn of the French Revolution, and portrays the life and adventures of two main characters - Léandre and Armandine, in an intense and immersive story.

Main features
① A SRPG taking place in the unique and fascinating world of 18th century Paris.
② Cross Platform, start playing on one device, and continue on another.
③ Dynamic Awareness System, a unique system that provides the characters in the game an awareness of movement and path choice of other characters around them.
④ Original weaponry experience level system, weapons can also be shared between players.

Please visit our website to know more about "Thermidor JRPG"
http://hyperdevbox.com

Minimum Requirements

  • OS: Windows 7+ 
  • Processor: Intel i5+ 
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM 
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better 
  • Storage: 500 MB available space 
  • Additional Notes: Direct3D 11+
